Departments

#### Childress Water Department

#### Our mission is to provide high-quality water and wastewater services efficiently and professionally.

###### HAVING A WATER EMERGENCY? CALL 940-937-7007 FOR ALL-HOURS EMERGENCY DISCONNECTS.

###### CONTACT:
